name: Race to the Everchanghing Tower
description:
My very first game ever. 

A short 3 leves hack and slash 2d platform. 

Enjoy, and please, DEMOLISH IT! Be rude and tell me everthing wrong with it.

I want to know, and learn in order to create a better product later.

Thanks.

Follow me on Twitter for the development of the next game

https://twitter.com/JinshinR
